mapper.select: SELECT d.district_id, d.district_name, d.center_lng, d.center_lat, t.town_id, t.town_name, t.longitude, t.latitude, n.neighborhood_id, n.neighborhood_name, n.neighborhood_addr, n.lng, n.lat FROM of_district d LEFT JOIN of_town t ON d.district_id = t.district_id LEFT JOIN of_neighborhood n ON t.town_id = n.town_id

SELECT count(TYPE_NAME) AS households, district_name AS levelName, of_district_id AS levelId, district_house_count AS levelHouseCount, count(TYPE_NAME) / district_house_count * 100 AS proportion FROM hsrjop.intelligence_hd_addr_info WHERE district_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY of_district_id

SELECT count(TYPE_NAME) AS households, town_name AS levelName, of_town_id AS levelId, town_house_count AS levelHouseCount, count(TYPE_NAME) / town_house_count * 100 AS proportion FROM hsrjop.intelligence_hd_addr_info WHERE district_name IS NOT NULL AND of_district_id = #{districtId} GROUP BY of_town_id
